properties.areaDesc: S of Cape Lookout NC to Surf City NC out to 20 nm; S of Ocracoke Inlet NC to Cape Lookout NC out to 20 nm
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued January 15 at 3:01PM EST until January 18 at 1:00AM EST by NWS Newport/Morehead City NC
properties.description:
* WHAT...North winds 15 to 25 kt with gusts up to 35 kt and seas
4 to 7 ft expected.

* WHERE...The coastal waters from Cape Lookout to Surf City.

* WHEN...From 7 PM Thursday to 1 AM EST Saturday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM THURSDAY TO 1 AM EST SATURDAY
